mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnsltDetail Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CNSLT_SN , CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN , CNSLT_KND_CD , CNSLT_TGT_CD , CSTMR_CLM_CD , INQ_TP_CD , INQ_DETAIL_TP_CD , CNSLT_DETAIL_STAT_CD , CNSLT_DETAIL_CONT , CNSLT_DT , CNSLT_CHRGER_ID , CNSLT_DETL_TRNSMIS_REQUST_YN , SMS_SND_COUNT , EMAIL_SND_COUNT , DELETE_YN , MAIN_DSP_YN , MTM_INQ_SN , MTM_INQ_ANS_TURN , GOD_INQ_SN , GOD_ANS_TURN , TRANS_CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN , TRANS_REQUST_TURN , CNSLT_TMPLAT_SN , CNSLT_TMPLAT_NM , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_SN = #{cnsltSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN = #{cnsltDetailTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
